original_text: Tell God's message to people. Always be ready to speak God's message clearly to people, whether they want to listen to you or not. Warn people when they are doing something wrong. Tell them to stop doing wrong things, and explain to them what they ought to do. But be very patient while you teach them what is true. Timothy 3
korean_text: 너는 말씀을 전파하라 때를 얻든지 못 얻든지 항상 힘쓰라 범사에 오래 참음과 가르침으로 경책하며 경계하며 권하라

sentences.original_text: Always be ready to speak God's message clearly to people,
sentences.korean_translation: 항상 사람들에게 하나님의 메시지를 명확하게 말할 준비를 하라.

sentences.original_text: whether they want to listen to you or not.
Warn people when they are doing something wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 잘못된 일을 할 때 그들에게 경고하라.

sentences.original_text: Tell them to stop doing wrong things,
and explain to them what they ought to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 마땅히 해야 할 일을 그들에게 설명하라.

sentences.original_text: But be very patient while you teach them what is true.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들에게 진리를 가르칠 때는 매우 인내하라.
